pageContext.claim: “He [Biden] wants to go with windmills that are made in Germany and China.”
pageContext.analysis: Biden wants to make the United States a green-energy manufacturing hub. As usual, Trump incorrectly thinks the biggest manufacturers of wind turbines are in Germany and China. In 2020, the top manufacturer was Vestas, based in Denmark, according to bizvibe.com. Second place belongs to Siemens Gamesa of Spain, with General Electric of the United States in fourth place. Six Chinese companies occupy six slots on the top ten, including third place. Nordex Group, based in Germany, is in eighth place.
